course.title: MAT 4387 Optimization: Theory and Practice (3 units)
course.desc: Optimization problems, nonlinear programming, unconstrained optimization, convexity and coercivity, existence theory, gradient and Newton methods constrained optimization, gradient method with projection, Kuhn-Tucker relations, duality, Uzawa method. Linear programming, simplex method.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: (MAT 2120, MAT 2121) or (MAT 2122, MAT 2125) or (MAT 2120, MAT 2322), (MAT 2324 or MAT 2384).
